content: * Cedar Fair reports record third quarter revenues; increases quarterly cash distribution
name: Cedar Fair LP
title: BRIEF-Cedar Fair reports Q3 earnings per share $3.38

content: * Cedar Fair Lp - ‍Richard Zimmerman  president and chief operating officer  will succeed Matt Ouimet as chief executive officer effective January 1  2018​
name: Cedar Fair LP
title: BRIEF-Cedar Fair announces planned leadership succession

content: * Cedar Fair Lp - ‍co  Peanuts Worldwide renewed license agreement to showcase Peanuts characters  created by Charles Schulz  to 2025​
name: Cedar Fair LP
title: BRIEF-Peanuts Worldwide and Cedar Fair extend Peanuts licensing agreement to 2025

content: * Cedar Fair reports 2017 second-quarter results; remains on track for a record performance in 2017
name: Cedar Fair LP
title: BRIEF-Cedar Fair reports second-quarter results

content: * Cedar Fair - preliminary net revenues through July 4  2017 of about $524 million  $2 million increase on same-park basis when compared with same period a year ago
name: Cedar Fair LP
title: BRIEF-Cedar Fair says preliminary net revenues up helped by increase in visits

content: * Cedar Fair announces pricing of $500 million senior unsecured notes
name: Cedar Fair LP
title: BRIEF-Cedar Fair reports pricing of $500 mln senior unsecured notes

content: * Cedar Fair announces offering of $500 million senior unsecured notes
name: Cedar Fair LP
title: BRIEF-Cedar Fair announces offering of $500 mln senior unsecured notes

content: * To reach its adjusted EBITDA goal of $500 million earlier than its original target of 2018.
name: Cedar Fair LP
title: BRIEF-Cedar Fair Q3 earnings per share $3.10

content: * Richard Zimmerman promoted to president  Source text for Eikon:  Further company coverage:
name: Cedar Fair LP
title: BRIEF-Richard Zimmerman promoted to president

content: * Preliminary net revenues through sept 5 increased 2 percent to $1.04 billion compared with $1.02 billion through Labor day weekend year ago
name: Cedar Fair LP
title: BRIEF-Cedar Fair announces record attendance  revenues through Labor day

content: * Cedar Fair reports 4% increase in net revenues through July 4th holiday weekend
name: Cedar Fair LP
title: BRIEF-Cedar Fair reports 4 pct rise in net revenues through July 4th holiday weekend

content: * Says Q1 net revenues up $12 million to $58 million compared with Q1 ended March 29  2015
name: Cedar Fair LP
title: BRIEF-Cedar Fair Q1 loss $0.87 per diluted unit

content: NEW YORK School's out for summer  gas is cheap  and amusement parks are bracing for a robust season that could see millions of attendees streaming through their gates this summer.
name: Cedar Fair LP
title: Amusement parks  a seasonal play  find year-round investors
